statements: SELECT * FROM hydropower_generation
SELECT id, location, actual_generation FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_capacity > 1000
SELECT location, actual_generation FROM hydropower_generation WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, date, generation_capacity FROM hydropower_generation WHERE actual_generation < 500
SELECT * FROM hydropower_generation WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM hydropower_generation ORDER BY location DESC, date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location, actual_generation FROM hydropower_generation WHERE actual_generation > 500 ORDER BY actual_generation DESC
SELECT location, generation_capacity FROM hydropower_generation WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY generation_capacity ASC
SELECT AVG(generation_capacity) AS avg_capacity, MAX(actual_generation) AS max_generation FROM hydropower_generation GROUP BY location HAVING avg_capacity > 250
SELECT id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%M %Y') AS month_year FROM hydropower_generation WHERE location='California' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM hydropower_generation ORDER BY generation_date DESC, generation_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT hydropower_id, generation_date, generation_amount FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND generation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY generation_amount DESC;
SELECT trend_description FROM hydropower_trends WHERE trend_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT hydropower_id, generation_date, generation_time, generation_amount FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_amount <= 500 ORDER BY generation_amount ASC, generation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_trends ORDER BY trend_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT hydropower_id, generation_date, generation_time FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY generation_date DESC, generation_time ASC;
SELECT AVG(generation_amount) AS average_generation FROM hydropower_generation;
SELECT trend_description FROM hydropower_trends WHERE trend_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59' ORDER BY trend_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT hydropower_id, EXTRACT(day FROM generation_date) AS day, EXTRACT(month FROM generation_date) AS month, EXTRACT(year FROM generation_date) AS year FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_amount < 500 ORDER BY year ASC, month ASC, day ASC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_generation WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT generation_kwh, date FROM hydropower_generation ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT generation_kwh, date FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_kwh > 100000 ORDER BY generation_kwh DESC
SELECT location_name, country FROM hydropower_locations ORDER BY country ASC, location_name DESC
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM hydropower_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM hydropower_generation WHERE generation_kwh > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location_name, country FROM hydropower_locations WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT location_id, date FROM hydropower_generation WHERE location_id = 3 AND date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT AVG(generation_kwh) AS average_generation FROM hydropower_generation
SELECT * FROM hydropower_trends WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_name
SELECT * FROM hydropower_sites;
SELECT site_name, river_name FROM hydropower_sites;
SELECT site_name, location, river_name FROM hydropower_sites WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT site_name, generation_date, generation_amount FROM generation_data ORDER BY generation_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_logs WHERE site_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM hydropower_sites WHERE river_name = 'Colorado River';
SELECT data_id, generation_date, generation_amount FROM generation_data WHERE generation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY generation_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT site_name, weather_date, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 10 OR precipitation > 50 ORDER BY weather_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM hydropower_plants ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM generation_records WHERE generation_amount > 1000;
SELECT plant_name, location, capacity FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT plant_id, log_date, log_time FROM maintenance_logs WHERE plant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY plant_name DESC;

SELECT plant_name, generation_date, generation_amount FROM hydropower_plants JOIN generation_records ON hydropower_plants.id = generation_records.plant_id WHERE generation_amount > 500 ORDER BY generation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE description LIKE '%scheduled%' AND log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT plant_name, outage_date, reason FROM hydropower_plants JOIN outage_reports ON hydropower_plants.id = outage_reports.plant_id WHERE outage_time BETWEEN '08:00' AND '12:00' ORDER BY outage_date DESC;
